lever.additional:
About the team:             

GoSend is the largest asset-less last mile delivery provider in Indonesia. It forms a part of the logistics suite of products and is the preferred provider of on-demand logistics in Indonesia delivering over 500,000 packages per day. The primary tech team is based out of Bangalore, India and the business team is based out of Jakarta, Indonesia.
As we look to grow, some of the focus areas for this year include- Improvements to same day delivery service and the algorithm behind clustering and creation of routes, adding intuitive features to consumer apps (Android/IOS) platforms to improve the delivery experience of consumer and enhancements to driver app to support the additional use cases.  

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the role:

This role entails navigating and identifying weak spots, constantly designing better and creative ways to break software and identifying potential problems. You would use your knowledge of testing to influence better software design, promote proper engineering practice, bug prevention strategies, testability, accessibility, privacy, and other advanced quality concepts across application areas in the Logistics domain. You would also be required to learn/contribute/build new frameworks using Kotlin/TestNG for both backend tests on a distributed microservices architecture and Native Mobile apps on Android/IOS platforms.
lever.descriptionPlain:
About the role:

This role entails navigating and identifying weak spots, constantly designing better and creative ways to break software and identifying potential problems. You would use your knowledge of testing to influence better software design, promote proper engineering practice, bug prevention strategies, testability, accessibility, privacy, and other advanced quality concepts across application areas in the Logistics domain. You would also be required to learn/contribute/build new frameworks using Kotlin/TestNG for both backend tests on a distributed microservices architecture and Native Mobile apps on Android/IOS platforms.
lever.text: Software Development Engineer in Test - GoSend

lists.content:
• Contribute to the test strategy, plan, automation infrastructure and execution of the prioritised roadmap for your product area
  • Work with developers and designers to ship features and product improvements
  • Work on mobile platforms (IOS, Android) for our consumer and driver-facing apps along with functional automation using Appium with Java/Kotlin 
  • Work on improving API tests coverage using Java/Kotlin and TestNG
  • Write load test scripts in Python
  • Work with developer team to review code changes and create a robust automation suite covering functional, integration aspects across apps in different countries
  • Understand customer data and analytics to identify areas of improvement and bring data focus during the feature discussions

• B.Tech/BCA or M.Tech/MCA degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 4+ years of experience working as an SDET/Test/Quality Engineer, ideally working on consumer-facing, large-scale products
  • As a fast learner and team player, you’re comfortable teaching yourself new skills quickly and can thrive in a complex and fast-paced environment while making strong technical individual contributions
  • Able to critically think about requirements/specs and use cases from testing/automation perspective and having a growth mindset towards work
  • Passionate about writing scalable test automation frameworks and utilities
  • Polyglot programmer who codes fluently in Java and/or Python and has experience with test frameworks (XUnit/BDD style) like Cucumber, TestNG. (Kotlin experience is desired but not mandatory)
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data/product to understand the overall picture and define & measure the appropriate level of test coverage (manual/automation) and do risk analysis
